resources.string: A sample game that tests your ability to click a button. Can you click faster than your friends? Only one way to find out! To play this game with friends, you must sign in with Google.
Invite friends to play a game.
See who is inviting you right now.
Click the button as fast as you can!
An error occurred while starting the game. Please try again.
is challenging you to a game!
There was an issue with sign in. Please try again later.

This app allows you to view 3D models that you have downloaded, or open 3D models directly from your browser. Supports STL, OBJ, and PLY models. Tap the VR button at the bottom to view the model in your VR headset!\n\nCopyright © 2017 Dmitry Brant.
Please allow read permission to open model files.
